newsitem.title: CANADA: DBRS upgrades Provigo unsecured debentures.
newsitem.headline: DBRS upgrades Provigo unsecured debentures.

text.p: Dominion Bond Rating Service Ltd said on Thursday that it had upgraded its rating on Provigo Inc unsecured debentures to BBB from BBB (low) with a stable trend.
DBRS also confirmed a rating of R-2 (middle) with a stable trend for Provigo's commercial paper.
"Provigo has largely completed a major internal restructuring, which resulted in reversing previous strategies and divesting non-core businesses," DBRS said.
Provigo strengthened its balance sheet by reducing net debt and redeeming C$85 million worth of preferred shares, DBRS added.
